Final thoughts :
Better BrRip version than the previous i already seeded also here few months ago 
Better IQ with less pixelation as well.(Not sure but may be even without any pixelation at all...)
few grain sometimes but it won't really compromise IQ at all.
Appears as a very very good copy anyway for sure.
Played,tested and checked on many different players with really good IQ.
However,beware : May laggy sometimes if you stop brutaly to watch it and playing back again (audio/video synchro playback's problem ?)
Anyway,don't worry,you won't regret it at all,you can trust me !
This way i wish you have/get a good film and have fun
Please,seed with me asap,as long as you can so.
Ty for your understanding
Btw,don't forget to regulary check most of your trackers list for update some of them if necessary when they could all especialy go on N/A status
(udp trackers ...)
Cheers and cu around
